name: VikasSDK
summary: VikasSDK SDK is a light weight SDK, and the single access point, to all the S2S bidding demand.
description:
VikasSDK is an Mobile In-App, S2S Header Bidding wrapper that can be seamlessly
integrated into your app with a light weight SDK. You can add as many demand sources
on the server side to maximize the competition for an impression in an auction without
any hassles.
